about_the_game:
In the not-so-distant future, humanity has mastered the art of cloning people, yet it has found no better application than employing them as zombies in a TV survival show. The show's goal is to endure for as long as possible, fending off hordes of zombies with the assistance of combat drones.

Game features:

  • Eradicate zombies using combat drones. Enhance their capabilities and introduce new types.

  • A self-guided drone targeting the nearest enemy with the option of manual target selection.

  • Saturate the arena with various traps, through which zombies perish in droves. Arrange the arena according to your taste!

  • Choose your player - a zombieminator that suits your preference.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: i5-4670K @ 3.40GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the show! Immerse yourself in this thrilling survival rogue-lite. How long can you endure the relentless challenge? Elevate your experience by upgrading combat drones and fortifying the arena with an array of cunning traps.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
